entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
